title: MX Linux Raspberry Pi Edition Officially Released for Raspberry Pi 5 and 4 SBCs
description:
MX Linux Raspberry Pi edition is now available for download supporting Raspberry Pi 4, Raspberry Pi 400, and Raspberry Pi 5 boards.

The post MX Linux Raspberry Pi Edition Officially Released for Raspberry Pi 5 and 4 SBCs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
